page.description: Reads multiple data items, then calls the onComplete event. Contrast with .getFromDataCache() which reads a single item.

argument.name: UXClientSideDataCacheItem
argument.description: A comma delimited list of data items to read. Can also be '*[js:*all]*' to read all data items.

argument.name: onComplete
argument.description: A javascript function that is called when after the data is read.

page.terms: ux component,client side data cache,offline access,disconnected applications,mobile apps,javascript functions
